summary: In the 1950s, a new generation of superheroes must join forces with the community's active veterans and a hostile US government to fight a menace to Earth.
cast: David Boreanaz|Miguel Ferrer|Neil Patrick Harris|John Heard|Lucy Lawless|Kyle MacLachlan|Lex Lang|Phil Morris|Kyra Sedgwick|Brooke Shields|Jeremy Sisto|Joe Alaskey|Jeff Bennett|Corey Burton|Townsend Coleman|Keith David|Sean Donnellan|Robin Atkin Downes|Shane Haboucha|David Hunt|Vicki Lewis|Joe Mantegna|Vanessa Marshall|Jim Meskimen|James Arnold Taylor|John F. Kennedy|Alan Ritchson
keywords: superhero team up|justice league|origin story|based on comic book|dc comics
title: Liga de la Justicia: La nueva frontera
